title: Plat 2 (S4 Diamond) ADC LFT
body:
Hey all,

I'm an ADC looking for a Platinum-Diamond team to join. I've been in a few teams during the past 12 months and I also competed in the Oceanic Open Ladder, so I have experience when it comes to a competitive environment. Admittedly I've been in a pretty bad slump gameplay-wise for the past month but it seems like I will soon be ready to bounce back and get back into form.

If you're interested in picking me up, add me on League :)

replies.body: ive got a silver 2 team, just not sure if your ready for that yet

> [{quoted}](name=TouchMyKimchi,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=qKfnB0kV,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-02T02:44:09.901+0000)
>
> ..definately not ready

What do you mean by that?
I think you need some more practice before you could join his Silver 2 team.

> [{quoted}](name=TouchMyKimchi,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=qKfnB0kV,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-02T02:53:24.861+0000)
>
> I think you need some more practice before you could join his Silver 2 team.

Oh, haha yeah xD
